attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Treat underage drinkers more harshly to enable the people working in the licensed trade have some belief and faith that they are not being victimised to combat the breakdown of the social communities.
Most do their job properly but the youths use every trick to get the alcohol but the staff are the ones who face the penalties while the youths get away with it time and time again

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
